title: Tranquillity in NSW's Countryside Including Sparkling Wine & Cheese Platter
description: If you’re planning a special getaway for you and your other half, Pericoe Retreat could just be the romantic property you're looking for. Located just outside of Dubbo, Pericoe Retreat boasts gorgeous suite accommodation and personalised hospitality far away from the hustle and bustle of the city, but within easy reach of all of Dubbo’s best attractions. Includes daily cooked breakfast, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, a delicious cheese platter and an AU$50 meal voucher.
